definition: rampart/base (in baseball)/to build with stones, bricks etc

sentences.english: It's a famous poem about baseball.
sentences.chinese: 这是一首关于垒球的名诗。

sentences.english: But in softball, the pitcher must throw the ball underhanded.
sentences.chinese: 但垒球的投手必须使用下手投球。

sentences.english: Most students understand the Baseball and Softball Games.
sentences.chinese: 大多数学生了解棒垒球运动。

sentences.english: Do you want to join the softball team?
There are only seven innings in a game of softball.
I lost my last softball game.
sentences.chinese: 我输了最后一场垒球赛。

sentences.english: Consider joining the company-sponsored softball team or other activities.
sentences.chinese: 可以考虑参加公司主办的垒球队或其他活动。

sentences.english: Sue? Do you want to join the softball team? We need another player.
sentences.chinese: 苏？你想参加垒球队吗？我们还需要个队员。

sentences.english: I joined the school softball and basketball teams and played football with the guys in the neighborhood.
sentences.chinese: 我和邻居家的伙伴们参加了学校的垒球队和篮球队。

sentences.english: The ISF is the world governing body of softball.
sentences.chinese: 国际垒球联合会是垒球的世界性管理机构。

sentences.english: The ISF is the world governing body of softball.
sentences.chinese: 国际垒球联合会是垒球的世界性管理机构。

sentences.english: The water polo was developed in Europe and termed as softball water polo first.
sentences.chinese: 水球起源于欧洲，最初被称为“水止垒球”。

sentences.english: Ah, you can take over softball practice today, right now in fact.
sentences.chinese: 你今天就能接手垒球队的训练，实际上是现在。

sentences.english: Youth softball teams are cutting back on travel to tournaments. (WHSV-TV)
sentences.chinese: 青年垒球队正缩短巡回赛行程。

sentences.english: After hundred year development, has formed the special baseball and softball movement culture.
sentences.chinese: 历经百年的发展，形成了特殊的棒垒球运动文化。

sentences.english: I spent a lot of time practicing playing softball after school every day in the past.
sentences.chinese: 我过去每天放学后花很多时间练习打垒球。

definition: football played with oval-shaped ball (rugby, American football, Australian rules etc)
